channel.title: Deep House Mixes - London, UK
channel.description: A selection of 46 deep house DJ mixes, over 52 hours of music, all recorded live.
channel.itunes:author: deephouse.uk

item.title: Joy - June 2024
item.description: A continuous deep house DJ mix, recorded live in June 2024, featuring music from TshegoTMM, Romeo Louisa, Next Phase, Helen Bruner, Terry Jones, N-Joi, Saffron, Kevin McKay, Lux Velour, Notelle, Sean McCabe, Jennifer Wallace, Storken, Pete Heller, Ridney, Negrocan, The Journey Men, Patrick Green, Mo'Cream.

item.title: Tell Me - May 2024
item.description: A continuous deep house DJ mix, recorded live in May 2024, featuring music from Salt City Orchestra, Ame Strong, Home, Garden, Lisa Shaw, Sam Ruffillo, Retromigration, Moon Boots, Modento, Clive From Accounts, Joselacruz, Thierry Tomas, Saison, Tom Caruso, Rachel Barror, Uschi Classen.

item.title: Kerri - April 2024
item.description: A continuous deep house DJ mix, recorded live in April 2024, featuring music from Marissa Guzman, Kerri Chandler, Bluey Robinson, Christopher McCray, Roy Ayres, Nadir Simon.

item.title: Cash - February 2024
item.description: A continuous deep house DJ mix, recorded live in February 2024, featuring music from Dua Lipa, Cafe 432, Lifford, H2O, Romeo Louisa, Drop Out Orchestra, Justin Harris, Blondewearingblack, Dennis Ferrer, KT Brooks, Sourires, Harry Choo Choo Romero, Motion Severn, Revival, Kathy Brown, GeO Gospel Choir, Cody Currie, DJ Spen, Soulfuledge.
